name: Pharmacopia
description:
Your little brother is dying from the pollution put out by the Pharmacopia company. You must travel to the top of their headquarters and steal the plans for an air purifier in order to save his life! Sneak past waves of drone guards, swing yourself right up to the office of Cedric E. Oscar, and overcome his tyranny.

This game was made for a game development course in collaboration with four other people from my university (names to be added once contact information is given):

Jenna Whilden: ItsPoundcake (itch username)

Angela Kerlin

Nathan McCutchen

Credit to:

huthaifa a. ahmed for the drone assets

grayshape for C.E.O's model

Keyframes for the gun model

Kevin Macleod's "Tyrant" for background music
